attributes.action: Create a 10% flat tax system over £18000 earned per year
attributes.additional_details: The other forms of taxation that would need to be abolished in order to introduce a flat tax system would include VAT, Business rates and corporation tax.
attributes.background: Create a 10% flat tax system over £18000 earned per year and abolish all other forms of taxation

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want the Government to introduce a flat tax system, to replace all other taxes, but it's not clear if you want this to be payable only on personal income, or also the income of businesses.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
